name: TrumpHateFacts
description:
TrumpHateFacts is a game where you play as Hillary Clinton and you must stop Donald Trump by telling him the political fact. Please make sure to play the game with the volume up so you can hear funny facts. Leave some feedback about the game down below.

Game-Play Control

  • A,W,D or Arrows keys = Movement.
  • Left mouse click = using facts with your loud speaker as projectiles.

Bug Problem

The game has a few bug with animation running on HTML5.

For the bug free version of the game download them in the link downbelow.
